attributes.action: Create a public register of freemasons occupying public positions of trust, where being part of that organisation could be a clear confict of interest.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: However unlikely this appears to be.At present, in an open court, it's possible for the policeman providing evidence, the lawyer representing the accused and the judge all to be masons and thus have their own secret agenda and influence the conclusion of a court case. Without giving any personal information away, could it be possible to verify if there would be conflict of interest on behalf of the accused to ensure justice can be served?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
